noun.description: A region or part of a town, a country, or the world.
examples: people living in the area are at risk

noun.description: The extent or measurement of a surface or piece of land.
examples: the room is twelve square feet in area

noun.description: A subject or range of activity or interest.
A sunken enclosure giving access to the basement of a building.
examples: a bicycle padlocked to the area railing

origin: Mid 16th century (in the sense space allocated for a specific purpose): from Latin, literally vacant piece of level ground.
